ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Robe of the Ishva
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm I can t tell you the answer to your specific question but my mage was given one of these as well and I love it. I am level 34 and think it is a Great piece
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm I can't tell you the answer to your specific
question but my mage was given one of these as well
and I love it. I am level 34 and think it is a Great
piece of gear, unless you can afford a UBA TWINKED
one.

I too look forward to what others have to say about
this one.

Great Question


Rob


--- Renee <rkbhalf@...> wrote:
> Hi all...
> I am just wondering.... I am a Human Mage and I just
> recently
> acquired the Robe of the Ishva. This item has no
> intelligence but it
> does have +50 Mana. Can someone please tell me what
> is better for a
> mage? I normally buy Intelligence items, but someone
> has told me that
> direct Mana is better. Can I get your opinions
> please????
>
> Thanks,
> Faroina
>
>
